scenes.description: Opening segment of the hololive DEV_IS special stage at the Countdown Live.
ReGLOSS members greet the audience and introduce their performance medley.
Flow Glow members take the stage, greeting the audience and introducing their cover of "Feeling Gradation".
Performance of "Feeling Gradation" by Flow Glow, with ReGLOSS joining them mid-song for a collaborative finale.
Ending MC where all performers gather to thank the audience and introduce the final song, "Our Bright Parade".

subtitles.original: 皆さん明けましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year, everyone!

subtitles.original: おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSSのWe are...メドレーです
subtitles.english: This is the "We are ReGLOSS" medley.

subtitles.original: ここからはホロライブデバイス、コラボステージです！聞いてください、FG ROADSTER by ReGLOSS。
subtitles.english: From here, it's the hololive DEV_IS collaboration stage! Please listen to "FG ROADSTER" by ReGLOSS.

subtitles.original: 搭載V8エンジン　第7感持ってろ現時点　ロックするこの世界と全人類　この5人でゲームをチェンジ
subtitles.english: Equipped with a V8 engine, keep your 7th sense for now. Locking onto this world and all humanity, we five will change the game.

subtitles.original: 唸る4輪発進全部　皆さんサンキュー三欄比　アイズル似た者の探訪　取る一番ここからズラ
subtitles.english: Roaring 4-wheel start, thank you everyone. Exploring similar souls, we'll take the lead from here.

subtitles.original: エスコート超えて頂点　チャンスもセットだ当然　登り上げる頂天　ステップ踏んでく昇天
subtitles.english: Beyond escorting to the peak, chances are set, of course. Rising to the top, stepping into ascension.

subtitles.original: 乗り込めFG ROADSTER　特殊部隊集合能力者　この歴史なほら超豪華　ぶっちぎりで置き去り降伏者
subtitles.english: Get in the FG ROADSTER, a special forces assembly of the gifted. Look at this history, so luxurious. Pulling ahead and leaving those surrendering behind.

subtitles.original: 今高速でぶち抜いていく大気圏　エンジンからジェットの炎揺れている開基へ
subtitles.english: Now blasting through the atmosphere at high speed. From the engine, jet flames are flickering toward the origin.

subtitles.original: 眼下に広がる大地へ越えていく回帰線　バックミラーにビッグブルーが映ってるIB M-FIRE
subtitles.english: To the land spreading below, crossing the tropic. Big blue reflected in the rearview mirror, IBM-FIRE.

subtitles.original: 打ち上げたいから飛んでく宇宙船　この年代口果てないで　銀河に推し旅等
subtitles.english: Wanna blast off, so the spaceship flies. Don't let this era end, an 'oshi' journey to the galaxy.

subtitles.original: 増えてるでっかいビジョン　燃えてるメンバー一同　ただいま現在進行形　越えてく世界規模
subtitles.english: A growing huge vision, all members are on fire. Right now, in progress, going global.

subtitles.original: 空はずのワンスター　心臓がモンスター　エリアズ足りな　FGパーティな
subtitles.english: The sky-should-be one star, heart is a monster. Areas aren't enough, it's an FG party.

subtitles.original: 光るディスコモンスター　ヘビーブースター　目覚めてく本能　青い炎
subtitles.english: Shining disco monster, heavy booster. Awakening instinct, blue flame.

subtitles.original: V-M-S Let's go out　突き抜ける風0から　空まで　トラまで　走るFG ROADSTER　唸るブースター　ログ残して見　今チェイスミー
subtitles.english: V-M-S Let's go out, wind cutting through from zero. To the sky, to the tiger, driving the FG ROADSTER. Roaring booster, leave a log and see, now chase me.

subtitles.original: 明けましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: ここからは私たちFlow Glowが、ReGLOSS先輩の「フィーリングラデーション」をかまさせていただきます！
subtitles.english: From here, we, Flow Glow, will perform ReGLOSS-senpai's "Feeling Gradation"!

subtitles.original: ニコタンが来た！
subtitles.english: Nikotan is here!

subtitles.original: セクシーにいくぞ、ショッピショマ！
subtitles.english: Going sexy, shoppishoma!

subtitles.original: エンズデカイ、レッツゴー！がんばるぞー！
subtitles.english: Ends de kai, let's go! Let's do our best!

subtitles.original: ジャマしちゃいけないな、ビビ
subtitles.english: Can't let them get in the way, Vivi.

subtitles.original: 私の音に、おいで！
subtitles.english: Come to my sound!

subtitles.original: ハイポップなステップ刻んで　紐解いていくシチュ
subtitles.english: Carving high-pop steps, unraveling the situation.

subtitles.original: 様変わりしてショウタイム　全然悪くないイマジネーション
subtitles.english: Transforming showtime, not a bad imagination at all.

subtitles.original: 視界の霧は晴れわたって　悲しみには別れを告げ
subtitles.english: The fog in sight clears up, bidding farewell to sadness.

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも中に放り出して　滲む空ピンクはバラ色
subtitles.english: Throw in the sour and sweet, the blurring sky is rose-pink.

subtitles.original: どれだけ上手く見せようとしても　君がいなければ何の意味もない
subtitles.english: No matter how well I try to show off, if you're not there, it means nothing.

subtitles.original: かすり傷すらつかない幻想　針の落ちないレコードのさ
subtitles.english: A fantasy without even a scratch, like a record where the needle won't drop.

subtitles.original: 赤い瞳（め）止めてね色を　追い風にして　Come let’s run
subtitles.english: Stop those red eyes, the color, with a tailwind, Come let's run.

subtitles.original: 誘（いざな）って吹き荒れる　向かい風にも心　靡かせて
subtitles.english: Invite and blow, let your heart flutter even in the headwind.

subtitles.original: 飛び立って　To the future　ライン引いたって終わりじゃない
subtitles.english: Take flight, To the future, even if a line is drawn, it's not the end.

subtitles.original: ときめいてしまえば　瞬く間に広がる解放感
subtitles.english: If you get excited, a sense of liberation spreads in an instant.

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ全てがドラマ　街も浴びたデベリスタライト
subtitles.english: Each and every thing is a drama, the city bathed in DEV_IS starlight.

subtitles.original: 変わり映え色づくパノラマ　満ち溢れるフィーリングラデーション
subtitles.english: A colorful panorama that changes, overflowing feeling gradation.

subtitles.original: 飛び立って　You make me up　恐れるものはない　Mr. Starlight
subtitles.english: Take flight, You make me up, there is nothing to fear, Mr. Starlight.

subtitles.original: 綺麗（きれ）いださ夜明けが　透明な明日を照らすよ
subtitles.english: How beautiful, the dawn will illuminate a transparent tomorrow.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 最後の曲は、Our Bright Parade!
subtitles.english: The last song is "Our Bright Parade"!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
Our Bright Parade
作詞・作曲・編曲：堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
Our Bright Parade
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Shota Horie

subtitles.original: パレード　パレード　パレード　輝くんだよ　呼び合う声を合図に
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, let it shine. With our calling voices as the signal.
